snippet: A judge ruled that an agency developing the tourism and gambling industries was legally able to exercise eminent domain on a building.
abstract: Charlie Birnbaum loses his fight to keep his Atlantic City home; Superior Court Judge Julio L Mendez rules New Jersey’s Casino Reinvestment Development Authority, charged with developing gambling and tourism industries in Atlantic City, can take Birnbaum's property through eminent domain, based only on general rationale of improving area; Birnbaum plans to appeal.
lead_paragraph: A judge ruled that an agency developing the tourism and gambling industries was legally able to exercise eminent domain on a building.

headline.main: Setback in Atlantic City for Man Hoping to Save Parents’ Home
headline.print_headline: Setback in Atlantic City for Man Hoping to Save Parents’ Home
